hero.title: Sign 365
hero.subtitle: Quickly prepare documents for electronic signature.

addDocument.title: Add your document
addDocument.description: Simply add or select your document and drop in signature and date fields.

shareDocument.title: Share your document
shareDocument.description: Choose who will see and sign your document, or share it with an attorney.

saveDocument.title: Save your document
saveDocument.description: Store signed documents for safekeeping and easy access anywhere.

slides.title: Justice for all
slides.description: We believe that everyone deserves equal access to legal protection and representation, regardless of their background or circumstances.

slides.title: Promote equal access nation wide
slides.description: Our mission extends across the nation, ensuring that quality legal services are accessible to individuals and businesses in every community.

slides.title: Enhance consumer and environment protection
slides.description: We advocate for stronger consumer rights and environmental safeguards, protecting both people and the planet through comprehensive legal solutions.

slides.title: Strengthen public trust in justice
slides.description: Through transparency, integrity, and unwavering commitment to fairness, we work to restore and strengthen public confidence in our justice system.

sign365Promo.title: Sign 365
sign365Promo.subtitle: with our digital signature for your legal documents
sign365Promo.description: Digital signatures allow lawyers and clients to securely, quickly, and legally sign legal documents directly from the application, without the need to print or scan files.

testimonials.subtitle: Find what they say about us!

ourServices.speechBubble: I'm so happy, I found this site!

footer.mission: We offer steadfast legal support, empowering individuals, families, and businesses with the strength and clarity to navigate life's challenges, ensuring access to justice and protection every day of the year.
